Enumeration# UIImage.SymbolColorRenderingMode

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
enum SymbolColorRenderingMode
```

## [Topics](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/symbolcolorrenderingmode#topics)

### [Enumeration Cases](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/symbolcolorrenderingmode#Enumeration-Cases)

[`case automatic`](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/symbolcolorrenderingmode/automatic)Automatically uses an appropriate color rendering mode for the symbol’s color layers.[`case flat`](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/symbolcolorrenderingmode/flat)Renders the symbol’s color layers using flat colors.[`case gradient`](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/symbolcolorrenderingmode/gradient)Renders the symbol’s color layers using gradients.### [Initializers](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/symbolcolorrenderingmode#Initializers)

[`init?(rawValue: Int)`](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/symbolcolorrenderingmode/init(rawvalue:))## [Relationships](/documentation/uikit/uiimage/symbolcolorrenderingmode#relationships)
